entries.meaning: A dessert made from ice cream frozen in a (generally spherical or hemispherical) mold.
(chiefly in German cooking, otherwise rare) A small, roughly hemispherical, chocolate-covered confection. (Compare truffle.)
examples: Sous-chef Daniel O'Reagan prepares an array of tempting desserts, including a zabaglione and marzipan bombe, chocolate mousse torte and an amaretto-flavored cheesecake.

entries.meaning: (computing) An electromechanical device used in early cryptanalysis.
